definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Learning basic footwork in Manipuri dance is essential.
sentences.chinese: 学习舞蹈的基本步法在曼尼普尔是必不可少的。

sentences.english: He then provides a four-step guide to managing nescience .
sentences.chinese: 他还提出了一个管理“新态”的四步法。

sentences.english: The technology of one step synthesis of terpinyl acetate from turpentine and glacial acetic acid is described.
sentences.chinese: 论述了松节油与冰乙酸一步法合成乙酸松油酯工艺。

sentences.english: The one-stage process silane crosslinked PE anti-precrossing linking technology was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一步法硅烷交联聚乙烯抗预交联技术。

sentences.english: The experimental studies on iron carbide formation by two step method have been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 在实验室条件下进行了二步法制备碳化铁的研究。

sentences.english: We sought to parry the charateristic soviet lunge with fancy footwork.
sentences.chinese: 我们以花式步法力图避开典型的苏联冲刺。

sentences.english: He then provides a four - step guide to managing nescience.
sentences.chinese: 他还提出了一个管理“新态”的四步法。

sentences.english: The backstep, or outside edge of the shoe, is also often used when stepping through.
sentences.chinese: 这种步法也常用于过渡。

sentences.english: It also borrows footwork found in fencing and techniques from Western classical boxing.
sentences.chinese: 它还借用了剑术的步法和西方传统拳击技巧。

sentences.english: A dance is a measured pace, as a verse is a measured speech.
sentences.chinese: 舞蹈是一串有规则的步法，就如韵文是拟好的言语。

sentences.english: Follow this simple, six-step system to ensure your emails get the job done.
sentences.chinese: 遵循确保你的电子邮件能完成任务的简单六步法。

sentences.english: The resulting bitboard contains all of the possible moves of Black's knights.
sentences.chinese: 得出的位棋盘中包含了所有可能的黑马步法。

sentences.english: Rosin modified nonylphenolic resin was synthesized by one - step synthesis in laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 在实验室内用一步法合成了松香改性壬基酚醛树脂。

sentences.english: Research on Time-cost Management of Foreign Trade Business Center;
sentences.chinese: 分步法的第一步是建立成本中心。

sentences.english: A single step chromatographic method for purification of C-phycocyanin from Aphanothece halophytica(AH-PC) was set up in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章确立了简便的一步法纯化盐生隐杆藻藻蓝蛋白。

sentences.english: Try to run with your natural gait, and avoid taking short, choppy strides.
sentences.chinese: 用自然步法跑，避免短促的，起伏不定的步法。

definition: pose or motion of one's body in martial arts
(music) fingering/(TCM) manipulation of acupuncture needles/(keyboard) typing technique/(dance) hand movements/(painting) finger method
Changquan - Northern Shaolin (北少林) - Longfist - Martial Art
